entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentSet<T> #110825
  • Hang during 'ComWrappers.TryGetOrCreateObjectForComInstanceInternal()' on Native AOT #110823
  • Number of packets is significantly increased for inbound and outbound calls from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110822
  • Class `Vector3` field assignation overwrites the next field's contents when using LLVM AOT #110820
  • [Android] [MonoAOT] Unify configuration between sample app and CI build #110811
  • Add an option so perf jit dump can optionally use TSC for timestamps. #110809
  • JIT: Swift register homing can be unified with general register homing #110808
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Record equality compare collection content only #110806
  • WASM MT: memory access out of bounds in System.Private.Xml.Tests #110805
  • Possible null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #110804
  • Memory leak using SslStream in dotnet9 running on Linux #110803
  • Environment.ProcessPath hangs with exe path > MAX_PATH #110800

Closed

  • PhiDefinitions are not zero cost #88841
    Future
  • Remove `GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED`. #6218
    Future
  • [Android] CoreCLR uses APIs available only since Android API28 #110470
  • JsonIgnore attribute incompatible with .NET required keyword #110810
  • JIT fails to merge trivial blocks after jump threading #85547
    Future
  • Hang during AddRef/Release calls from GC callbacks for IReferenceTracker support #110747
  • NativeAOT doesn't pass the app manifest to the linker #110798
  • 在实操中采用Console.WriteLine方法输出派生类的基类引用出的基类成员时出现System.FormatException:“Input string was not in a correct format.错误，更改格式化方式后恢复正常 #110785
  • Extra memory used when attempting to JIT generics that have one or more structs as a generic type parameter or when accessed through an interface. #37143

PullRequests

Created

  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Enable inlining for late devirtualization #110827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add `ccmp` and enable if-conversion for X86 #110826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code from IPAddress #110824
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix build with -DCLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_BROTLI=true #110816
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110815
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110812
    os-android, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] Update icu dependencies and clean the manifest #110802
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove uses of DECODE_RETURN_KIND part of GCInfo #110799
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix OSEncoding math overflow #110796
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Generalize parameter register to local mapping in the backend #110795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110744
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • JIT: remove phis right after optimizing #110821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: revise how we track if nodes have been morphed #110787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FindFirstFile, FindNextFile and FindClose from PAL #110797
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug in HttpHeaders #110790
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110762
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows." #110801
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Tizen linux-armel build #110792
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove `FCThrow`s from Reflection APIs. #110766
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Improve x86 HWIntrinsic containment #110736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Chain `SIGSEGV` native crashes to the default `SIGSEGV` handler #110741
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescPtrFromIp #110755
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110765
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling. #110732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid array allocation in Task.WhenAll? #110777
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110629
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix a comment to match the function signature #110631
    area-VM-coreclr
